channel.title: Dementhium error
channel.description:
hi people, i have been trying to make a token currency shop in dementhium but i managed to do the shop but i removed the info bit where all the stats are and it tells you about the item and the price of the item i'll show you it in a screen.
what i removed http://scr.hu/0kmz/kzcl3
ok so what i want it to do, because i still have that botton at the top "info" whenever i put my mouse on the items in the shop i want to make it so that when somebody clicks the item in the shop it will say how much the item is.
ok so i started some code on it but i got this error i don't know weither this is the write code to use if not could you tell me what code i could use error:
src\org\dementhium\content\interfaces\ItemInfo.java:20: error: cannot find symbo l c.getItems().getUntradePrice(/*14484, Dragon Claws*/); ^ symbol: variable c location: class ItemInfo 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
please can somebody help me thanks.

item.title: Dementhium error
item.dc:creator: @yourbad yourbad
item.description:
@yourbad wrote:

hi people, i have been trying to make a token currency shop in dementhium but i managed to do the shop but i removed the info bit where all the stats are and it tells you about the item and the price of the item i’ll show you it in a screen.

what i removed
http://scr.hu/0kmz/kzcl3

ok so what i want it to do, because i still have that botton at the top “info” whenever i put my mouse on the items in the shop i want to make it so that when somebody clicks the item in the shop it will say how much the item is.

ok so i started some code on it but i got this error i don’t know weither this is the write code to use if not could you tell me what code i could use
error:

src\org\dementhium\content\interfaces\ItemInfo.java:20: error: cannot find symbo
l
c.getItems().getUntradePrice(/14484, Dragon Claws/);
^
symbol: variable c
location: class ItemInfo
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

please can somebody help me thanks.
